DIRECT ENTRY  
(i) ABU accepts  
a) NCE Double Major in Art and ND/HND credit 
in relevant programmes.    
b) ‘A’ level/ IJMB passes in Chemistry, and any of  
Physics and Mathematics     
c) ND credit in Glass Technology from any accredited  
institution   
d) NCE credit in Chemistry.   
e) HND credit in Science, Materials Science and 
Engineering, or in Chemical Engineering from any 
accredited institution.  
(ii) BAUCHI accepts ND/HND upper credit NCE Double Major 
in Fine Arts, ‘A' level in Fine and Applied Arts.  
(iii) CRUTECH accepts NCE in Fine Arts or ND in Fine Arts with 
minimum credit of 2.5.
